column4: does a Video Capture Card that plays TV and records TV unto hard drive work on Ubuntu?
anyone know pls?
Yes it does.
but the software that comes with the card is for MS XP only
Several programs for such purposes - check them all in Applications > Add/Remove
You don't need winxp software - search for open source alternatives! :D
ok :)
That's the magic of open source!
ok cheeers big ears!
lol
under Applications > Add/Remove, there is nothing for it
Did you enable the uni/multi repos?
uni/multi repos?
I was in Add/Remove just yesterday. There were PLENTY of such apps. Search!
search for what?
Universe and Multiverse Repositories.
give me one name for search for
name one app that works for video captuire card!   I cant see one
Please tell me that you have at least enabled the universe and multivere repos?
how can I check that?
yes I have universe and multivere repos
but I cant see one app for video card
ok ill wait
type this here: /join #djahelpchat
